questions.question: What is their most annoying 'bad habit' that they refuse to admit is annoying?
If they were arrested with no explanation, what would you assume they did?
What is the most 'out of character' thing they have ever done?
What is a weird hill they are absolutely willing to die on?
If they were a character in a horror movie, would they be the first to die or the surprise villain?
What is their 'useless superpower' (something they are weirdly good at that doesn't matter)?
What is the fastest way to start an argument with them?
If they won the lottery, what is the first ridiculous, unnecessary thing they would buy?
What is the one song they would definitely be caught singing poorly in the shower?
What is their most 'chaotic' personality trait?
